verses.1: Ka khuadakkik leh huih lakah a leeng laizial khat ka mu hi.
verses.2: Vantungmi in, “Bang na mu hiam?” ci-in hong dong a, kei zong, “Laizial a leeng khat ka mu a, a dung pi sawm thum pha-in, a vai pi sawm le pi nga pha hi,” ci-in ka dawng hi.
verses.3: Tua ciangin amah in kei kiangah, “Leitung gam khempeuh ah a tung ding hamsiatnate, hih lai tungah kigelh hi. Guta khempeuh, gam sung panin kisiak mang ding hi, ci-in laizial dal lang khat ah kigelh a, a man lopi-in ka min tawh thuciam mi khempeuh zong kisiak khia mang ding hi, ci-in alang khat ah kigelh hi.
verses.4: Vanglian Topa in hih samsiatna a khah khiatna ding thu gen a, guta mite khempeuh le a man loin ka min tawh thuciam mite khempeuhʼ inn sungah lut ding hi. Tua bang miteʼ inn sungah a tawntungin hamsiatna omin, amaute a kipan a sing a suang, a vekpi-in sumai ding hi,” hong ci hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin vantungmi hong kilang kikin kei kiangah, “Tu-a a hong pai ding en in,” hong ci hi.
verses.6: Kei zong, “Bang ahi hiam?” ci-in ka dong hi. Amah in hong dawng a, “Tua pen ciangpi hi a, gam sung khempeuhʼ mawhna lim ahi hi,” hong ci hi.
verses.7: Tua ciangpi siin pen haknaw tawh a kibawl ahi hi. Tua bangin ka et laitakin haknaw kibawl tua ciangpi siin pen kidom to a, tua ciangpi sungah numei khat a tu hi.
verses.8: Tua ciangin vantungmi in, “Hih numei pen gitlohna lim ahi hi,” hong ci hi. Tua ciangin vantungmi in ciangpi sungah tua numei hen sukkik a, a siin tawh tua ciangpi a siinkik hi.
verses.9: Tua ciangin ka khuadak leh numei nih ka mu a, gun vapi bangin kha nei-in, keima lamah hong leeng uh hi. Van lamah tua ciangpi a leen pih to uh hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin vantungmi kiangah, “Koi lai ah leen pih ding ahi uh hiam?” ci-in ka dot leh
verses.11: amah in, “Biakinn khat a lamsak dingin Babylon gamah a leen pih ding ahi uh hi. Biakinn a lamsak uh a zawh uh ciangin, biak dingin tua ciangpi kikoih ding hi,” ci-in a hong dawng hi.
